CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Select Accommodation stage positioned above or below the Make Reservation stage?
SRP.A: The Select Accommodation stage is positioned {above} the Make Reservation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Select Accommodation?
VE.A: The value of stage Select Accommodation is {1637}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Make Reservation?
VE.A: The value of stage Make Reservation is {587}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Search Travel Packages, with a value of {2876}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Travel to Destination, with a value of {480}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Search Travel Packages to stage Select Accommodation?
SC.A: Decreased by {1239} Thousand Tourists from stage Search Travel Packages to stage Select Accommodation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Select Accommodation to stage Book Flight?
SC.A: Decreased by {725} Thousand Tourists from stage Select Accommodation to stage Book Flight.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Make Reservation to stage Travel to Destination?
SC.A: Decreased by {107} Thousand Tourists from stage Make Reservation to stage Travel to Destination.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2256? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 749? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Make Reservation} stage has {587}, the {Travel to Destination} stage has {480}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 533 and 2256? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Select Accommodation} stage has {1637}, the {Book Flight} stage has {912}, the {Make Reservation} stage has {587}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Select Accommodation to Book Flight, or from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Select Accommodation} to {Book Flight} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Select Accommodation to Book Flight, from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination, or from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Select Accommodation} to stage {Book Flight} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Search Travel Packages} and {Select Accommodation} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Make Reservation} and {Travel to Destination} stages.
